timeline.author: nicops

replies.bodyText:
We will check that (the pattern).
On the other hand, the Light Client capability should be a default. By default any full node should serve Light Clients, removing it will cause that no Full Node will serve them.
I think the root of this problem is the bad way that defaults and config settings are handled in general in the code.
replies.author: smcsicardi

timeline.bodyText:
Like ajl says on his blog https://blogs.msmvps.com/lopez/2012/08/09/tdd-unit-tests-and-mocks/ it's undesirable to mock so much when testing. Ideally, we should have factories to build these objects for us, it is a strong smell to resort to mock all these classes, especially domain classes like Block and Transaction, since it's not exactly the external, unpredictable world the one we're mocking.
There is a BlockBuilder class for this, it might be a bit unwieldy for the purposes of this test, but I think it merits trying to make efforts in order to make non mocking tests easy to code.
